languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт говорит тихо — едва слышно для вас.{/n} "Мы должны были оставаться для мон-кай тенями — призраками, блуждающими среди древних руин. Но ты, элантах... чья рука привела тебя на Лилэтан? Провидение или проклятье? Муаран, дозволь {mf|ему|ей} говорить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт говорит тихо — едва слышно для вас.{/n} "Мы должны были оставаться для мон-кай тенями — призраками, блуждающими среди древних руин. Но ты, эл'антар... чья рука привела тебя на Лилэтан? Провидение или проклятье? Муаран, дозволь {mf|ему|ей} говорить — среди всех мон-кай, что я встречала здесь, эт{mf|от|а} зрит глубже и отчетливее".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, elantach... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт говорит тихо — едва слышно для вас.{/n} "Мы должны были оставаться для мон-кай тенями — призраками, блуждающими среди древних руин. Но ты, элантах... чья рука привела тебя на Лилэтан? Провидение или проклятье? Муаран, дозволь {mf|ему|ей} говорить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, el'antar... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak — of the mon-keigh I have met here, this one sees more deeply, more keenly, than the rest."

{n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, el'antar... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak — of the mon-keigh I have met here, this one sees more deeply, more keenly, than the rest."

But you, el'antar... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak — of the mon-keigh I have met here, this one sees more deeply, more keenly, than the rest."

{n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, elantach... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特轻声对你开了口，你几乎听不到她的声音。{/n}“我们本不该在猴子面前露面的，我们本该像古老废墟中游荡的幽灵一样。可是你，外界人……是谁的手，指引你带到了莉莱赞？是命运，还是诅咒？穆兰，请允许{mf|他|她}发言。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, elantach... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特轻声对你开了口，你几乎听不到她的声音。{/n}“我们本不该在猴子面前露面的，我们本该像古老废墟中游荡的幽灵一样。可是你，外界人……是谁的手，指引你带到了莉莱赞？是命运，还是诅咒？穆兰，请允许{mf|他|她}发言。”

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは、かろうじて聞き取れるような小声で話す。{/n}「モン＝ケイの影の存在として、太古の廃墟をさまよう亡霊であり続けるべきだった。けれどエランタ…お前は誰の手に導かれてリラエタンにやって来た？運命か？天罰か？ムアラン、{mf|彼|彼女}の発言を許してもらいたい」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, elantach... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは、かろうじて聞き取れるような小声で話す。{/n}「モン＝ケイの影の存在として、太古の廃墟をさまよう亡霊であり続けるべきだった。けれどエランタ…お前は誰の手に導かれてリラエタンにやって来た？運命か？天罰か？ムアラン、{mf|彼|彼女}の発言を許してもらいたい」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet spricht so leise, dass du sie kaum verstehst:{/n} "Wir hätten Schatten für die Chem-Pan-Sey bleiben sollen – Geister, die in den alten Ruinen umherwandern. Aber Ihr, Elantach ... wessen Hand hat Euch nach Lileath geführt? Schicksal oder Verdammnis? Muaran, erlaubt {mf|ihm|ihr}, zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, elantach... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet spricht so leise, dass du sie kaum verstehst:{/n} "Wir hätten Schatten für die Chem-Pan-Sey bleiben sollen – Geister, die in den alten Ruinen umherwandern. Aber Ihr, Elantach ... wessen Hand hat Euch nach Lileath geführt? Schicksal oder Verdammnis? Muaran, erlaubt {mf|ihm|ihr}, zu sprechen."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet parle d'une voix si basse que vous la comprenez à peine.{/n} « Nous aurions dû rester dans l'ombre des mon-keigh, comme des fantômes hantant les ruines antiques. Mais vous, elantach... À qui appartient la main qui vous a {mf|mené|menée} sur la lilaethan ? Au destin ou à la damnation ? Muaran, laissez-{mf|le|la} parler. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, elantach... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet parle d'une voix si basse que vous la comprenez à peine.{/n} « Nous aurions dû rester dans l'ombre des mon-keigh, comme des fantômes hantant les ruines antiques. Mais vous, elantach... À qui appartient la main qui vous a {mf|mené|menée} sur la lilaethan ? Au destin ou à la damnation ? Muaran, laissez-{mf|le|la} parler. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet habla en voz tan baja que apenas puedes oír sus palabras.{/n} «Deberíamos haber sido sombras para los mon-keigh; fantasmas entre las ruinas ancestrales. Pero tú, elantach... ¿qué mano te ha traído al Lilaethan? ¿La del destino o la de la perdición? Muaran, permítele hablar».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, elantach... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet habla en voz tan baja que apenas puedes oír sus palabras.{/n} «Deberíamos haber sido sombras para los mon-keigh; fantasmas entre las ruinas ancestrales. Pero tú, elantach... ¿qué mano te ha traído al Lilaethan? ¿La del destino o la de la perdición? Muaran, permítele hablar».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet o kadar sessizce konuşuyor ki söylediklerini zar zor seçebiliyorsun.{/n} "Mon-keighlere kendimizi göstermemeli, kadim harabelerde gezen hayaletler olarak kalmalıydık. Ya sen elantach... Seni Lilaethan'a hangi güç getirdi? Alın yazısı mı yoksa baş belası mı? Muaran, bırak da konuşsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet speaks so quietly, you can barely make out her words:{/n} "We should have remained shadows to the mon-keigh — ghosts wandering amidst the ancient ruins. But you, elantach... whose hand led you to the Lilaethan? Destiny or damnation? Muaran, allow {mf|him|her} to speak."

Ya sen elantach... Seni Lilaethan'a hangi güç getirdi? Alın yazısı mı yoksa baş belası mı? Muaran, bırak da konuşsun."
